paragraphs.text: This document is still in draft

This analysis doesn’t include all report designs. If there is need a report designs for interface purposes a report with all available fields can be used. A new version of this document with report designs will be prepared before 01.01.2026

The maintenance department manages its whole operation on the application of Maximo. IT department has multiple application technologies to serve multiple goals. There is an ongoing effort to collect most of the running application to a common technology to decrease licensing cost and improve support capabilities. Due to this effort, increased licensing and maintenance cost of Maximo, a migration of this application to other platform is decided. There is an ongoing project to replace Maximo functions of Maintenance Management (its called DIVA) but due date is 2027 with a possibility of delay. There is a need to replace Maximo for two years (until Diva project goes live in Ankara).

Some of the functions will be left out for the simplicity of the project and to reduce the cost. Some of the functions will be added to improve user experience and process success if their development costs are relatively low.
The main functions to be implemented are listed below

The purpose is to replace maintenance management functions on the Maximo application with another application that will last for 2 years and keeping development costs minimum as much as possible. Other goals are below.
Keep record for sensitive decision and information (approvals and cost)
All the function on Maximo application that used by maintenance department and related departments. Related departments are cost controlling, Accounting, logistics and warehouse.
Out of scope Information are mentioned under Process details
The requirement is to gather requests, manage approval process and track the whole process.
Taking over of request responsibility by SL-Engineer user
How many tickets closed per month
How many tickets open per month
Inputs, outputs and used data fields
SL or Engineer Technical Approval user Id
SL or Engineer Technical Approval date time
Business Manager Request Approval date time
Business Manager Cost Approval User info
Business Manager Cost Approval date time
Taking over of request responsibility by SL-Engineer user
Responsible SL or Engineer user Id
Responsible SL or Engineer Takeover date time
Solution responsible assigned by user Id
First manager of this requester checks and approve the ticket
The solution responsible can be change at any time by maintenance engineer or SL
Current responsible and approved users might be different due to position changes so approved user and current responsible user Ids should always be recorded.
Request can be cancelled by admin at any time
Request can be cancelled by creator If there is no update by his manager.
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
All users can access and create job Request
Job Request Form must be filled by the requester or someone else can fill the form and they approve with PKI.
Users can see the tickets that have been created by him/her. Managers can see their tickets and their personals tickets.
Solution Responsible can see all the tickets
There should be common users assigned to the department and can be used by multiple user and approve by user PKI cards when having action to a ticket.
Decision logs must be kept and records should have a reports page
Rejection can be revoked by admin and log should be recorded
Normal – Possibility of Production slow down
Low – Partial productivity loss or risk
Default is empty and it had to be selected
Default is empty and it had to be elected
Expected and estimated finish date is out of scope
There will be no progress updates just predetermined status changes
This process is addresses all actions to manage assets maintenance and main data activities.
Enter the record of assets to the Maintenance Management Application
Creating space and keeping relations to the documents that is needed for maintenance and scrapping process.
Creating records for the assets that has been received or identified.
Mass upload of assets with an Excell file
Marking assets as to reviewed by maintenance for relevancy
Matching SAP asses number with maintenance asset number
Creating records for the assets that has been received or identified.
Last Calibration date changed by Id
Mass upload of assets with Excel file
Marking assets as to reviewed by maintenance for relevancy
Matching SAP asset number with maintenance asset number

Asset received by maintenance department before it has an asset number on SAP, to sustain the maintenance operation, a maintenance inventory number assig to this asset by user. When the asset receive an SAP asset number these two numbers should match on the records. There could be an primary key to use for asset records even it mentioned on the document it should be visible to users not to make them confused with three different id numbers.
Maintenance inventory number must be mandatory and unique. When a user entered a maintenance inventory number, it should be checked if its unique. If its not, user should be informed.

If an asset couldn’t identified on records and if it has not initial entry on SAP or any application, A record created for it but it is not going to match with an SAP asset number. To state this case asset acquisition method will be filled as “unidentified asset found”.
Asset types are not mandatory it will be filled by maintenance if there is a need
Asset maintenance number have to be unique and it should be checked when saving
Asset location, Sublocation 1 and sublocation 2 can be changed by Cost Center Asset Responsible or Cost Center Responsible

“Marking assets as to reviewed by maintenance for relevancy” this action done by Maintenance key user. When maintenance key user identify and upload the maintenance relevant assets does the following actions. The user list all new added assets. Download list as excel. Check all assets title if they are relevant for maintenance department. Selects the relevant records. Add maintenance information. Fit these information to excel upload template and upload the maintenance information. When all these maintenance information entered to theses assets, The key user select all the assets reviewed by him or her and marked by a button as reviewed. So that in the future maintenance key users doesn’t spend time to check these assets.
Maintenance Admins can create and change assets
Maintenance personal only could add documents
Maintenance personal can view all information
Users can only view if the asset assigned to them
Managers can only see if the asset is assigned to their personal and themselves.
Keep records of asset assignment history
Approval of Current Asset assigned user
Approval of Current Asset assigned user first manager
Auto creation of asset assignment for the user who starts off-boarding
Print out of Asset assignment with all ,info and current status
Keep Records of asset assignment History
See the history of asset assignment of multiple assets
List asset assigned assets for selected departments
Create a Request for Asset assignment of an Asset
Current Asset assigned user first manager user info
Assets new assignee user first manager user info

Current asset holder approval date time
Current asset holder approver user info
Approval of receiving users first manager
Approval of receiving users first manager
Approval of receiving users first manager date time
Approval of receiving users first manager user info
Approval of Current Asset assigned user first manager
Approval of Current Asset assigned user first manager
Approval of Current Asset assigned user first manager date time
Approval of Current Asset assigned user first manager user info
Auto creation of asset assignment for the user who starts off-boarding
Print out of Asset assignment with all ,info and current status
Keep Records of asset assignment History
See the history of asset assignment of multiple asset
Current holder first manager approval date time
New holder manager approval date time
List assigned assets for selected departments
Exchange date can be in future or in the past. if left empty it will be filled with current date when approval process finished.
If one of the users rejects the process ends with rejection and asset assignment records won’t change but the request records will be kept
If a manager approves a record on behalf of his/her employee a pki card approval should be taken by personnel or signed document image should be uploaded at the approval session.
Auto asset assignment will be created for the each asset hold on the user that is being off-boarding. Receiving user will be its first manager but it can be change by the manager.
Only approved maintenance personal could change asset status during this process
Even though ticket is rejected users still can add documents and add comments
First manager of current holder can act on be half of current holder, if it’s the case second high managers should approve the assignment so that one higher manager approve.
If an assignment starts with of boarding it should be stated at description as “Users off boarding process has been started.”

We should be able to download a PDF document that have the information of the process, legal information’s and approval information. It can be downloaded at any time but if an approval missing it should be clearly visible(highlighted with red color).
The process can be started on behalf of current user but assets can not receive on be half of a user. Always user should approve the legal warnings before the ticket finalized.

If a user hesitates from approving asset receiving record will be wait for 30 days and automatically passed to approver manager. Approver manager should be informed before about this process and possible asset receiving before approval.
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
There is an parallel approval process on the flow but current assignee can be decided as the following order; current holders first manager than, new holder manager approval than, current holder.

There is 2 different identification for user. The first one is company employee Id. Every person has this number. Second one is Windows domain user Id. Every person that has computer access has this number and login process will be handled with this user information. Maintenance management application might have new unique id for each user but it shouldn’t shown to the user unless there is a technical problem. Users can see the Company employee ID’s last three digit of other users.
Any user could start asset assignment process by SAP asset number or Maintenance asset number.
All approvers can see records that pending approval from them.
All users can view all records that they have created or approved.
Managers can view all records that have already hold by him and personnel, acquired or given away assets records.
Request can be change until the first approval.
Cost center change is going to be handled in other process
Approval and rejection for duty finish
Periodic measure planning for measured maintenance
Measure method, communication person could be added
Duration of the duty default is one day but it can be increased by days.
Assign asset list to a maintenance requirement
Auto creation of maintenance duties for a year ahead at the end of every month
Recreation of duties after a change on, maintenance requirement, tasks and asset list
Enter comment to unfinished tasks that why they haven’t been handled
Add file to tasks, it will be used as additional entry to explain the situation that why task couldn’t be finished in time.
Start of the visit of the duty and end of the duty visit should be entered as date and time
Tasks should be able to approved individually and there should be a function to mark them altogether
Materials that have been used at the visit can be added to the record as material number, quantity and unit of measure
Material numbers should supplied before hand to the system ad should be selected from a list
Unit of measure should be suggested automatically
Which tasks has been done and which tasks are left aside for each visit should be able to see.
Auto update of status for the duties that has less than a month, weekly
Approval and rejection for duty finish
Rejection reason should be entered from SL or Engineers
How much duty, visits and tasks have been done by users
List maintenance took place for a selected assets
List awaited maintenance duties for selected assets
There must be log data for all changes, creations, deletion but not views.

Same fields with 2.a.i. Assign for a maintenance responsible
All fields of duty (1.a.3.1.a. Creation of duty)
Tasks should be able to approved altogether
Item list of each task that have been approved

Add file to tasks, it will be used as additional entry to explain the situation that why task couldn’t be finished in time.
Start of the visit of the duty and end of the duty visit should be entered as date and time
Materials that have been used at the visit can be added to the record as material number, quantity and unit of measure

Which tasks has been done and which tasks are left aside for each visit should be able to see.
Attachment of unfinished tasks (duty document group Id)
Auto update of status for the duties that has less than a month, weekly
Approval and rejection for duty finish
Rejection reason should be entered from SL or Engineers
How much duty, visits and tasks have been done by users
List maintenance duty took place for a selected assets
List awaited and ongoing maintenance duties for selected assets
There must be log data for all changes, creations, deletion but not views.
SL and engineers should be able to see the comments that have been entered as a result of unfinished tasks
Comments can be done duties rather than tasks
Attachments can be added to duties rather than tasks
SL and Engineers should approve the duty rather than approve tasks individually

Same Periodic Maintenance and Tasks should be applied with one entry and updates on task and other fields should be done for mass maintenance requirements duties automatically. This change should be done right after the change but if there is a technical limitation, it can be done at the end of the day.
Duty titles should be created automatically with “Maintenance requirement name” & “Maintenance period” & “Asset Title” for mass maintenance duty creation

Asset groups can be used for several maintenance requirements and if there is an asset added to list new duties should be created, is an asset subtracted from the list open duties should be cancelled. This change should be done right after the change but if there is a technical limitation, it can be done at the end of the day.
Duties are created with the status of “Planned”. Weekly duties are checked and if there is less than 5 week to the required date status change to “Active”
Mass maintenance planning should have one date rather than having individual dates of assets.
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
Maintenance requirements, asset group and tasks can only be added by SL and Engineers
All the rest can be access able for Maintenance responsible and sl and engineers
Each user can access to the ticket if its responsible, approver or approved.
Mobile devices won’t be used in the process
Ergün Kaya handles maintenance of assets that belong to Human resources and excluded from project
FIPC department handles maintenance to IT devices and excluded from project
Visit should not be planned beforehand, Schedule or duration is not going to planned. users will be free of planning and conducting the visits. Only actual duration records will be enough.
There won’t be need for route planning for multiple maintenance duties. It will be only planned for same type of assets not a mixed type.
Solution are not going to have duty list printout or check it on mobile devices.
Business days or holidays doesn’t need to be handled. It can be handled by user on their work schedules.
View functions are not going to be logged.
Route / Mass maintenance requirements are purposed to create maintenance duties. Routing or ordering duties are out of scope. It will be handled by user itself.

When requestor approved the solution and if the asset given to maintenance department before it has accepted that requestor received the asset.
Alternative user to receive asset can be changed by creator or maintenance personal and change should be logged in another table.

Requestor approval and asset taken back should be done at the same time. It can be done by requestor, requestors first manager and alternative user to receive asset approver. PKI approval can be done with common user.
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
SL-TL authorization group should be created
Standard user authorization group should be created
This process is aimed to collect and document the approval of cost center change of an asset
Approval of receiving cost center asset responsible
Approval of current cost center responsible
Approval of current cost center director
Approval of changes done on SAP

Exchange date is going to filled automatically with the creation date and can be changed before first approval.
Current Cost center asset responsible is going to start process so it will be accounted as approved
Cost Center asset responsible backup have view authorization and can take action on behalf of Cost center asset responsible.
Change on SAP can be done by Accounting key users.
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
Only Current Cost Center asset responsible can create ticket
Only assets on the cost center that has been responsible of can be listed and selected to create a record.
Only records that the user is created by, approver or already approved by ticket can be seen on the reports
Maintenance Key users can see all records of Maintenance department responsible
Asset key user can see all records
Accounting responsible role should be created and authorized to approve “change on SAP” step.
All the approvals and processing of asset retirement would like to be handled, traced and reported with this solution
Asset Retirement approvals of legal and accounting rules
Reevaluate date set and postpone with an explanation
Add scrapping manual to the asset
A4 printable document that contains all the information
Created by on behalf to user info
Request created by on behalf of user info
“Invoice request form” has been filled check box

Approval of Maintenance manager date time

Asset Retirement approvals of legal and accounting rules
Asset Retirement Accounting Approval date time
Asset Retirement Accounting Approval user info
Reevaluate date set and postpone with an explanation
Reevaluation date set by user info
Add scrapping manual to the asset
List of finished and ongoing requests
Comments can be added at all times
If asset is in the responsibility of maintenance than physical scrapping goes to maintenance SL & Engineer group otherwise it should goes to the asset cost center responsible.
Assignment should be freed from current holder after process has done. Asset assigned user field should be emptied.
Cost center asset responsible backup will have view authorization as and can take action on behalf of cost center asset responsible
If an asset is going to be sold. The selling prize is mandatory on creation. The “Invoicing request form has been filled” check box should be checked manually on creation.
A word document template of “Invoicing request form” should be able to be downloaded on the creation page.
Asset Accounting Info will be received from SAP when asset selected
Current assignee field will be filled automatically to easily identify the person that action is waited from. When process finished it will be emptied.
Asset information’s will be received daily from SAP if an assets information missing from SAP Asset retired directly from SAP status
Users can see all details but they can only reach the records that they have created, approved, approver or approved on behalf.
Cost Center asset responsible and backups can only create tickets and view them If there is not any approval has been done values can be changed.
There can be more than one asset responsible for a cost center
Actions on SAP will be handled manually
The assets accounted as costs are out of scope
There wont be a counting process for the assets
Saved materials from scrapping wont be recorded here. It will be handled with kaizen processes
There is no need to keep asset information of the outside of the maintenance asset. Just retirement process is enough.
Detailed on an attached excel file
Detailed on an attached excel file

There is 2 different identification for user. The first one is company employee Id. Every person has this number. Second one is Windows domain user Id. Every person that has computer access has this number and login process will be handled with this user information. Maintenance management application might have new unique id for each user but it shouldn’t show to the user unless there is a technical problem. Users can see the Company employee ID’s last three digit of other users.
When users doesn’t have computer access

When users doesn’t have account or computer access their first level manager can create ticket for them or their colleagues may create ticket on behalf of them but they should approve the transaction with their PKI card. Log PKI readings and on behalf approvals
Their manager can create ticket on behalf of them or take actions on behalf of them
When users have time limited assignment for another position
When there is a request created by on behalf of someone. This on behalf record will be kept on onbehalf records. Person view the record will see the name of the creator but not the person replaced.
There will be no additional action should be taken
Managing open tickets when users position change
Their first level manager will be take place for the person that has changed the department. This manager can assign another person within its department.

Admins can attach a file to a screen. These can be user manuals, example image to fill the screen or empty templates If a screen has such an attachment. It will be stated at the bottom of the screen with the title “Page specific documents” and attachments will be listed with attachment no, title, document type with the tooltip creator user info and creation date time.
Approve transaction with PKI card to identify user that make the transaction.
All common user based on department and any person in the department can change their current session to common user session.
Assigns to record on a process
Can be changed in to invisible by the commentor or admin
Cant be changed into active again
If a user can view a record this user can comment
Comments are always can be added even the processes of the record is finished.
All rejections can be revoked by admins
All transaction and changes should be logged.
All log-ins will be handled automatically with windows authorization
When users entered user can transform current session to common account
If windows authorization is not for real person then common account logs in for the department
Web page design will be responsive
Archiving will be handled as another project after Diva Project
Use cases will be delivered as individual word files and a excel file as a whole list
Windows authorization should be supplied for logins
Single roles and role groups should be supplied
Role groups can be assign user individually or to a department so who ever assigned to this department receives the authorization automatically
150 ~200 new assets are being added to system per month
10 out of one asset has scrapping manual document
Asset assignments doesn’t have attached documents
Each job request will have 1 document per request
Daily back-up, for 2 days, weekly back-up for 4 weeks.
All asset information should be updated daily including cost center
SAP integration for Asset retirement information
IAM integration for authorization if possible
MAN Ankara Plant standard internet connection
Ölçülü bakım için iletişim kurulacak kişiler alanındaki bilgiler çok az kullanıcak ayrı bir tabloda takip etmek mantıklı mı? ;Geliştirici ile görüşülecek
Operasyonel ihtiyaçlar için süreç tasarımları ve tablo alanları tanımlanmadı. Plaformun hazır çözümleri incelenecek eksik olan fonksiyonlar varsa sadece onların tasarımı eklenecek.
Raporların analizi yapılmadı çalışmanın sonuna doğru gerçekleştirilecek. İhtiyaç halinde olan verilerin raporlandığı rapor yapıları kullanılacak.
Kalibrasyon ihtiyacı sınırlı sayıda malzemede var bu bilgi ayrı tabloda tutulmalı mı?

SRM kalem numarası olmadan aseet kayıtları nasıl eşleşecek? SAP asset title2’den alınacak tesx ile işletilebilir mi? kalem numarası olmayanlarda öneri olarak gösterilip kullanıcın seçim yapması istenebilir mi?
Asset Retirement retirementta para birimleri sabit tabloda böyle bir kayıt alanına gerek var mı?
Hangi bilgilerle gidilecek hangi bilgiler alınacak ve
Bilgi gönderilecek veya alınacak sistemdeki geliştirmelerin yapılabilmesi için teknik doküman hazırlanmalı.
Karşı sistemin çalışmadığı durumda süreci manuel ilerletmek için gerekli aksiyon planı da bu bürece dahil edilmeli.

Last update:24.10.2025 17:36
by: Tasdelen, Yasin FIPC
